before_you_start.heading: Before you start
before_you_start.content:
The information you provide about risk will help keep the $t(person_noun) safe, as well as everyone who comes into contact with them.

Answer all questions to the best of your knowledge.
before_you_start.content_prison:
The information you provide about risk will help keep the $t(person_noun) safe, as well as everyone who comes into contact with them.

You will be able to add information from case notes, adjudications and other system like Mercury

before_you_start.content_police:
The information you provide about risk will help keep the $t(person_noun) safe, as well as everyone who comes into contact with them.

Answer all questions to the best of your knowledge, and base your answers on the $t(person_noun)’s:

- PNC warnings
- risk assessment, custody and arrest records
- behaviour and demeanour while in custody
- any other risk information including previous offences
